# Jyserai

> Platform for creating viral "J'y serai" (I'll be there) visual content for events

## Overview
Jyserai is a web application that allows users to create personalized event visuals, purchase tickets, and share their attendance on social media. Users can upload photos, apply event-themed frames, and generate shareable content.

## Key Features
- Visual generator with customizable photo frames for events
- Ticket purchasing and digital wallet management
- QR code ticket scanning for event check-in
- Campaign management for event organizers
- Social sharing with optimized OG meta tags
- AI-powered frame generation for event posters

## Important Routes
- / - Landing page
- /events - Browse public events
- /dashboard - User dashboard
- /wallet - Digital ticket wallet
- /auth - Authentication
- /:slug - Campaign/event pages by slug

## Technology
Built with React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and Supabase backend.
